metadata.name: Pepe's rainy day
metadata.description:
Pepe lived in Moon Lake, located in Iris Valley.
Every day seemed boring because
he already swam and explored every angle of the lake.
“What is it going to be, the world above?”
 
When the rainbow raindrops were falling,
he prayed that he would have wings
like a butterfly he had seen
so that he could fly above the water and
explore the whole world.
Then, the magic of rainbow raindrops
had made Pepe’s wish come true.
 
Pepe flew around gleefully.
But, the magic had its limited time.
After the rain, he had to return to his original form.
From there on, he has looked forward
to the rainbow raindrops.
 
pitter-patter, pitter-patter, pitter-patter, pitter-patter
